projects.name: THRIVE
projects.description: An attempt at a real-time strategy videogame. Started during Github Game Jam 2018.

projects.name: GONE TRAINING
projects.description: Website that integrates with Facebook Messenger to connect personal trainers to potential clients via a personal assistant/chatbot. Handles billing and scheduling for trainers. Built for a client who works in the fitness industry.

projects.name: CITY AGENDA MANAGER
projects.description: A small web application built for the City of Miami officials to write and schedule meeting topics to be displayed on a TV broadcast graphic. Worked with a multimedia producer to integrate the service to a CGLive service.

projects.name: FORGET WHAT YOU HEARD
projects.description: A web app that creates a Spotify playlist while attempting to ban any music already listened to. Takes multiple artist suggestions to seed the playlist. Built for myself to provide a more adventurous music discovery experience.

projects.name: AUTO SYNC AMAZON WISHLIST & GOOGLE DRIVE
projects.description: A running job that queries an Amazon wishlist and posts new items to a spreadsheet on Google Drive. Built for myself to provide a better interface for following up on and sharing recommendations.

jobs.name: Frontend Software Engineer
accomplishments: Developed a cross-platform app to provide an analytics dashboard and internal project management features primarily for our clients to manage their building utility usage.
Wrote specs and facilitated UX discussions for several features and projects including a help website that integrated with a custom-built CMS and tutorials on all platforms.
First-hire under management, providing onboarding and documentation for many new-hires.

jobs.name: Full Stack Software Engineer
accomplishments: Worked across the stack with a small dev team on tight deadlines, following Agile methods to build a frontend with Angular and a backend REST API with ASP.NET, designing relational schemas, and integrating government-run medical databases.
Led UX revamp to improve registration and reduce data entry across workflow, which resulted in a 28-percent signup increase for our prescriptions savings tool.

jobs.name: Frontend Software Engineer
accomplishments: Built a custom ember-runtime based JavaScript framework which we used to implement small single page applications that provided insurance and health-assesement to our clients’ employees.
Led development of a blackbox test suite using Jasmine and Selenium to confirm core feature stability of a legacy application.

jobs.name: Software Engineer
accomplishments: Built a custom ember-runtime based JavaScript framework which we used to implement small single page applications that provided insurance and health-assesement to our clients’ employees.
Led development of a blackbox test suite using Jasmine and Selenium to confirm core feature stability of a legacy application.

jobs.name: Junior Software Engineer
accomplishments: Built dashboard with AngularJS to manage event marketing campaigns and large PHP/Zend backend API.
Converted PSD designs to responsive websites for highly customized big brand name clients.

jobs.name: INTERN WORDPRESS DEVELOPER
accomplishments: Developed WordPress based sites with custom themes for local businesses.
Worked with clients directly, handling revisions and feedback.
Plugin development, QA testing, and writing reference guides and documentation.

education.name: B.S. Computer Science
accomplishments: Senior project was an Android app built with React Native that commanded a drone to take images of crops and reported yields using computer vision algorithms.

education.name: A.A. Mass Communications
accomplishments: Member of Deans List and Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society with a 3.75 GPA.
Managing Editor of the campus newspaper.

projects.name: chord-sketch
projects.description: A small prototype for an audio tool that generates random chords and let's you modify them. Supports exporting to MIDI files. I use it to inspire creativity when I'm writing music.

projects.name: forget-what-you-heard-playlists
projects.description: Built on an older Spotify API, this web app generates a playlist based on artist suggestions, choosing music that is not already in the user's Spotify library.

projects.name: thrive
projects.description: My attempt at a real-time strategy game when I entered in a Github Game Jam. I learned a lot about rendering and pathfinding in hexagonal coordinate systems while working on this.

projects.name: react-native-scroll-direction
projects.description: A React Native package that derives and exposes the scroll direction in ScrollView and FlatList components.

projects.name: react-native-calendars
projects.description: A calendar component for React Native that I had to extend in order to support some extra date-picking features for my company's mobile app.

projects.name: lattice.js
projects.description: A jQuery plugin built to handle every carousel use case I imagined at the time. Handles both HTML content and images, four-directional sliding, responsive, dynamic thumbnail support and more.

projects.name: city-agenda-manager
projects.description: A small web app I built for the City of Miami to manage meetings saved in a CGLive text file. Pretty basic CRUD capabilities running on Laravel (PHP) backend.

projects.name: 8tracks-mix-feeds
projects.description: My first side project ever! It's a WordPress plugin that displays collections of mixes from 8tracks.com. It uses built-in shortcodes from WordPress.

projects.name: amazon-wishlist-to-drive-sheet
projects.description: An integration that checks for new items from an Amazon wishlist and updates Google Sheets. This was really useful for budgeting my extra expenses.

projects.name: deep-object-diff
projects.description: A small library that can compare two JavaScript Objects, including nested structures of arrays and objects.
